synopsis.text: Warring States era in Hinomoto. Amidst the chaos, deep in the unexplored forests of Kinokuni, a formidable mercenary group called Saika Ikki emerges, wielding guns and waving the Yatagarasu flag. Their enigmatic leader, Magoichi, hails from a foreign land. Meanwhile, Saburo, a determined protector of Hinomoto, senses the looming threat of European powers. As the two cross paths, they must unite to defend their homeland against the invading forces. This anime, based on the multimedia project Rusted Armors, unfolds the dynamic relationship between Magoichi and the Sengoku era warlord Oda Nobunaga. The fate of these two unlikely allies intertwines in a gripping tale of survival, warfare, and camaraderie.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
